game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious map leads you to an undiscovered ruin in search of a powerful artifact. Retrieve it and return to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary sword

task.description: Make your way through the dense jungle and find the entrance to the ancient ruins.
Solve the riddle on the stone door to unlock the artifact's chamber.
Defeat the guardian and retrieve the lost artifact.
